Posts.Content: my nipple area has been itching for months now. and recently noticed my right nipple has gotten smaller. i also have a small red bump underneath it. i also have eczema im not sure of thats whats causing the itching. I'm only 20 i read that you dont get breast screening until youre older but im thinking of making an appoitmnent once i get insurance again sorry for typos im typing on my phone. 0 likes, 2 replies Report
